Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.1.2 Windows 64bit

Problem: Some engines either have no plume and sound or plume on when engine isn't. I suspect it's a Real Plume issue but wanted to check that I haven't done something wrong. Details in album below. My tests weren't exhaustive so status of individual mods is a guess.

Mods installed:

Full mod list for album, all mods updated as of 20:00 BST 21.05.16:

Quote

ModularFlightIntegrator

Reproduction steps:

Launch rocket with effected engine.

Log:

Output log
Are you sure that a) RealPlume is installed and b) if the folder exists is it actually populated with the correct content? Your log shows that no "RealPlume" folder was ever registered by KSP.

Thank you! The folder actually was missing. I think CKAN failed to install it for some reason but forgot to tell me. I'll remember not to trust it so much in future. I did a test and it seems to be working, I'll update if any are still missing.
